title: Sean McVay on Stafford-Goff trade, Rams rivalry vs. 49ers, skipping NFL Combine
itunes:title: Sean McVay on Stafford-Goff trade, Rams rivalry vs. 49ers, skipping NFL Combine
description:
Los Angeles Rams head coach Sean McVay joins Mike Silver for a conversation that touches on the reasons McVay chose to skip the 2022 NFL Combine, why the Super Bowl-winning coach regrets how the trade unfolded that sent Jared Goff to the Detroit Lions in exchange for Matthew Stafford, whether McVay's life has changed significantly since winning a championship and his thoughts on retirement, and what McVay thinks of the perception that Kyle Shanahan and the 49ers are in his head. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
